TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IidSpikeEstimator extends Microsoft.ML.Data.TrivialEstimator`1<class Microsoft.ML.Transforms.TimeSeries.IidSpikeDetector>
Public NotInheritable Class IidSpikeEstimator Inherits TrivialEstimator(Of IidSpikeDetector)

Docs.summary: Detect a signal spike on an independent identically distributed (i.i.d.) time series based on adaptive kernel density estimation.

remarks.format:
To create this estimator, use [DetectIidSpike](xref:Microsoft.ML.TimeSeriesCatalog.DetectIidSpike(Microsoft.ML.TransformsCatalog,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,Microsoft.ML.Transforms.TimeSeries.AnomalySide)).
[!include[io](~/../docs/samples/docs/api-reference/io-time-series-spike.md)]
### Estimator Characteristics | | | | -- | -- | | Does this estimator need to look at the data to train its parameters? | No | | Input column data type | <xref:System.Single> | | Output column data type | 3-element vector of<xref:System.Double> |
[!include[io](~/../docs/samples/docs/api-reference/time-series-props.md)]
[!include[io](~/../docs/samples/docs/api-reference/time-series-iid.md)]
[!include[io](~/../docs/samples/docs/api-reference/time-series-pvalue.md)]
Check the See Also section for links to usage examples.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class Microsoft.ML.SchemaShape GetOutputSchema(class Microsoft.ML.SchemaShape inputSchema) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetOutputSchema (inputSchema As SchemaShape) As SchemaShape

Docs.summary: Schema propagation for transformers. Returns the output schema of the data, if the input schema is like the one provided.
